Armor-Piercing Rounds.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.
Armor-Piercing Rounds.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

Backup Magazine.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
Backup Magazine.name: Backup Magazine
Backup Magazine.flavorText: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

Bison Steak.description: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).
Bison Steak.name: Bison Steak

Bundle of Fireworks.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
Bundle of Fireworks.name: Bundle of Fireworks
Bundle of Fireworks.flavorText: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

Bustling Fungus.description: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).
Bustling Fungus.name: Bustling Fungus
Bustling Fungus.flavorText: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 1 second.

Cautious Slug.description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.
Cautious Slug.name: Cautious Slug

Crowbar.description: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.flavorText: Deal bonus damage to enemies above 90% health.

Delicate Watch.description: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.
Delicate Watch.name: Delicate Watch
Delicate Watch.flavorText: Deal bonus damage. Breaks at low health.

Energy Drink.description: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).
Energy Drink.name: Energy Drink

Focus Crystal.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).
Focus Crystal.name: Focus Crystal
Focus Crystal.flavorText: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.

Gasoline.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.
Gasoline.name: Gasoline
Gasoline.flavorText: Killing an enemy ignites other nearby enemies.

Item Scrap, White.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, White.name: Item Scrap, White
Item Scrap, White.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Lens-Maker's Glasses.description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
Lens-Maker's Glasses.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
Lens-Maker's Glasses.flavorText: Gain 10% chance for hits to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Medkit.description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.
Medkit.name: Medkit
Medkit.flavorText: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

Mocha.description: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).
Mocha.name: Mocha
Mocha.flavorText: Slightly increase attack speed and movement speed.

Monster Tooth.description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.
Monster Tooth.name: Monster Tooth
Monster Tooth.flavorText: Drop a healing orb on kill.

Oddly-shaped Opal.description: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.
Oddly-shaped Opal.name: Oddly-shaped Opal
Oddly-shaped Opal.flavorText: Reduce damage the first time you are hit.

Paul's Goat Hoof.description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).
Paul's Goat Hoof.name: Paul's Goat Hoof

Personal Shield Generator.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.
Personal Shield Generator.name: Personal Shield Generator

Power Elixir.description: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.
Power Elixir.name: Power Elixir
Power Elixir.flavorText: Receive an instant heal at low health. Consumed on use.

Repulsion Armor Plate.description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.
Repulsion Armor Plate.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
Repulsion Armor Plate.flavorText: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.

Roll of Pennies.description: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.
Roll of Pennies.name: Roll of Pennies

Rusted Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.
Rusted Key.name: Rusted Key
Rusted Key.flavorText: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains a powerful item.

Soldier's Syringe.description: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).
Soldier's Syringe.name: Soldier's Syringe

Sticky Bomb.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
Sticky Bomb.name: Sticky Bomb
Sticky Bomb.flavorText: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

Stun Grenade.description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.
Stun Grenade.name: Stun Grenade

Topaz Brooch.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).
Topaz Brooch.name: Topaz Brooch
Topaz Brooch.flavorText: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

Tougher Times.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
Tougher Times.name: Tougher Times

Tri-Tip Dagger.description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.
Tri-Tip Dagger.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Tri-Tip Dagger.flavorText: Gain +10% chance to bleed enemies on hit.

Warbanner.description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
Warbanner.name: Warbanner
Warbanner.flavorText: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.

AtG Missile Mk. 1.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.
AtG Missile Mk. 1.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1

Bandolier.description: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
Bandolier.name: Bandolier
Bandolier.flavorText: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Berzerker's Pauldron.description: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Berzerker's Pauldron.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
Berzerker's Pauldron.flavorText: Enter a frenzy after killing 4 enemies in quick succession.

Chronobauble.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).
Chronobauble.name: Chronobauble

Death Mark.description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.
Death Mark.name: Death Mark
Death Mark.flavorText: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.

Fuel Cell.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
Fuel Cell.name: Fuel Cell
Fuel Cell.flavorText: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

Ghor's Tome.description: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.
Ghor's Tome.name: Ghor's Tome
Ghor's Tome.flavorText: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.

Harvester's Scythe.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.
Harvester's Scythe.name: Harvester's Scythe

Hopoo Feather.description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.
Hopoo Feather.name: Hopoo Feather

Hunter's Harpoon.description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.
Hunter's Harpoon.name: Hunter's Harpoon
Hunter's Harpoon.flavorText: Killing an enemy gives you a burst of movement speed.

Ignition Tank.description: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.
Ignition Tank.name: Ignition Tank
Ignition Tank.flavorText: Your ignite effects deal quadruple damage.

Infusion.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.
Infusion.name: Infusion
Infusion.flavorText: Killing an enemy permanently increases your maximum health, up to 100.

Item Scrap, Green.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Green.name: Item Scrap, Green
Item Scrap, Green.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Kjaro's Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.
Kjaro's Band.name: Kjaro's Band
Kjaro's Band.flavorText: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.

Leeching Seed.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.
Leeching Seed.name: Leeching Seed

Lepton Daisy.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.
Lepton Daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
Lepton Daisy.flavorText: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event and 'Holdout Zones' such as the Void Fields.

Old Guillotine.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.
Old Guillotine.name: Old Guillotine
Old Guillotine.flavorText: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

Old War Stealthkit.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).
Old War Stealthkit.name: Old War Stealthkit

Predatory Instincts.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.
Predatory Instincts.name: Predatory Instincts
Predatory Instincts.flavorText: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

Razorwire.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius
Razorwire.name: Razorwire
Razorwire.flavorText: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.

Red Whip.description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).
Red Whip.name: Red Whip

Regenerating Scrap.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.
Regenerating Scrap.name: Regenerating Scrap
Regenerating Scrap.flavorText: Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. Usable once per stage.

Rose Buckler.description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.
Rose Buckler.name: Rose Buckler

Runald's Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.
Runald's Band.name: Runald's Band
Runald's Band.flavorText: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.

Shipping Request Form.description: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack).
Shipping Request Form.name: Shipping Request Form
Shipping Request Form.flavorText: Get a delivery each stage that contains powerful items.

Shuriken.description: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.
Shuriken.name: Shuriken
Shuriken.flavorText: Activating your Primary skill also throws a shuriken. Recharges over time.

Squid Polyp.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.
Squid Polyp.name: Squid Polyp
Squid Polyp.flavorText: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.

Ukulele.description: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).
Ukulele.name: Ukulele

War Horn.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).
War Horn.name: War Horn
War Horn.flavorText: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

Wax Quail.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
Wax Quail.name: Wax Quail
Wax Quail.flavorText: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

Will-o'-the-wisp.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.
Will-o'-the-wisp.name: Will-o'-the-wisp

57 Leaf Clover.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.
57 Leaf Clover.name: 57 Leaf Clover

Aegis.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.
Aegis.name: Aegis
Aegis.flavorText: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

Alien Head.description: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).
Alien Head.name: Alien Head

Ben's Raincoat.description: Whenever you would receive a debuff, prevent it. Increases maximum health by 100 (+100 per stack).
Ben's Raincoat.name: Ben's Raincoat
Ben's Raincoat.flavorText: Become immune to all debuffs. Increase maximum health.

Bottled Chaos.description: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).
Bottled Chaos.name: Bottled Chaos
Bottled Chaos.flavorText: Activating your Equipment triggers an additional, random Equipment effect.

Brainstalks.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.
Brainstalks.name: Brainstalks
Brainstalks.flavorText: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

Brilliant Behemoth.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.
Brilliant Behemoth.name: Brilliant Behemoth

Ceremonial Dagger.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.
Ceremonial Dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
Ceremonial Dagger.flavorText: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

Defensive Microbots.description: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
Defensive Microbots.name: Defensive Microbots
Defensive Microbots.flavorText: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

Dio's Best Friend.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.
Dio's Best Friend.name: Dio's Best Friend

Frost Relic.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 2m. Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).
Frost Relic.name: Frost Relic
Frost Relic.flavorText: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

H3AD-5T v2.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.
H3AD-5T v2.name: H3AD-5T v2
H3AD-5T v2.flavorText: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.

Happiest Mask.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).
Happiest Mask.name: Happiest Mask
Happiest Mask.flavorText: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

Hardlight Afterburner.description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.
Hardlight Afterburner.name: Hardlight Afterburner
Hardlight Afterburner.flavorText: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

Interstellar Desk Plant.description:
On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.

The plant heals for 5% of maximum health every 0.5 second to all allies within 10m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.
Interstellar Desk Plant.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
Interstellar Desk Plant.flavorText: Plant a healing fruit on kill.

Item Scrap, Red.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Red.name: Item Scrap, Red
Item Scrap, Red.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Laser Scope.description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack).
Laser Scope.name: Laser Scope
Laser Scope.flavorText: Your 'Critical Strikes' deal an additional 100% damage.

N'kuhana's Opinion.description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
N'kuhana's Opinion.name: N'kuhana's Opinion

Pocket I.C.B.M..description: All missile items and equipment fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack)
Pocket I.C.B.M..name: Pocket I.C.B.M.
Pocket I.C.B.M..flavorText: All Missile items deal more damage and fire an additional two missiles.

Resonance Disc.description: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).
Resonance Disc.name: Resonance Disc
Resonance Disc.flavorText: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.

Sentient Meat Hook.description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
Sentient Meat Hook.name: Sentient Meat Hook
Sentient Meat Hook.flavorText: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

Shattering Justice.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
Shattering Justice.name: Shattering Justice
Shattering Justice.flavorText: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

Soulbound Catalyst.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).
Soulbound Catalyst.name: Soulbound Catalyst

Spare Drone Parts.description: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and cooldown reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.
Spare Drone Parts.name: Spare Drone Parts
Spare Drone Parts.flavorText: Your drones fire faster, have less cooldowns, shoot missiles, and gain a bonus chaingun.

Symbiotic Scorpion.description: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.
Symbiotic Scorpion.name: Symbiotic Scorpion

Unstable Tesla Coil.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
Unstable Tesla Coil.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
Unstable Tesla Coil.flavorText: Shock all nearby enemies every 10 seconds.

Wake of Vultures.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).
Wake of Vultures.name: Wake of Vultures
Wake of Vultures.flavorText: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

Artifact Key.description: A stone shard with immense power.
Artifact Key.name: Artifact Key
Artifact Key.flavorText: A stone shard with immense power.

Charged Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.
Charged Perforator.name: Charged Perforator
Charged Perforator.flavorText: Chance on hit to call down a lightning strike.

Defense Nucleus.description: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).
Defense Nucleus.name: Defense Nucleus
Defense Nucleus.flavorText: Summon an Alpha Construct on killing an elite.

Empathy Cores.description: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.
Empathy Cores.name: Empathy Cores
Empathy Cores.flavorText: Recruit a pair of Solus Probes that gain power with more allies.

Genesis Loop.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .
Genesis Loop.name: Genesis Loop
Genesis Loop.flavorText: Fire an electric nova at low health.

Halcyon Seed.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.
Halcyon Seed.name: Halcyon Seed
Halcyon Seed.flavorText: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

Irradiant Pearl.description: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).
Irradiant Pearl.name: Irradiant Pearl

Item Scrap, Yellow.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Yellow.name: Item Scrap, Yellow
Item Scrap, Yellow.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Little Disciple.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.
Little Disciple.name: Little Disciple

Mired Urn.description: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.
Mired Urn.name: Mired Urn
Mired Urn.flavorText: Siphon health from nearby enemies while in combat.

Molten Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.
Molten Perforator.name: Molten Perforator
Molten Perforator.flavorText: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.

Pearl.description: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).
Pearl.name: Pearl

Planula.description: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).
Planula.name: Planula

Queen's Gland.description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.
Queen's Gland.name: Queen's Gland

Shatterspleen.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.
Shatterspleen.name: Shatterspleen
Shatterspleen.flavorText: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.

Titanic Knurl.description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).
Titanic Knurl.name: Titanic Knurl

Brittle Crown.description:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time.

Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.
Brittle Crown.name: Brittle Crown
Brittle Crown.flavorText: Gain gold on hit... BUT surrender gold on getting hit.

Corpsebloom.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.
Corpsebloom.name: Corpsebloom
Corpsebloom.flavorText: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.

Defiant Gouge.description: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.
Defiant Gouge.name: Defiant Gouge
Defiant Gouge.flavorText: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.

Egocentrism.description: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 bombs (+1 per stack). Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.
Egocentrism.name: Egocentrism
Egocentrism.flavorText: Gain multiple orbiting bombs. Every minute, assimilate another item into Egocentrism.

Essence of Heresy.description:
Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.

Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
Essence of Heresy.name: Essence of Heresy

Eulogy Zero.description: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.
Eulogy Zero.name: Eulogy Zero
Eulogy Zero.flavorText: Items and equipment have a small chance to transform into a Lunar item instead.

Focused Convergence.description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.
Focused Convergence.name: Focused Convergence
Focused Convergence.flavorText: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging... BUT reduce the size of the zone.

Gesture of the Drowned.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
Gesture of the Drowned.name: Gesture of the Drowned
Gesture of the Drowned.flavorText: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.

Hooks of Heresy.description:
Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom.

Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.
Hooks of Heresy.name: Hooks of Heresy
Hooks of Heresy.flavorText: Replace your Secondary Skill with 'Slicing Maelstrom'.

Light Flux Pauldron.description: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).
Light Flux Pauldron.name: Light Flux Pauldron
Light Flux Pauldron.flavorText: Halve your cooldowns.. BUT halve your attack speed.

Mercurial Rachis.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.
Mercurial Rachis.name: Mercurial Rachis
Mercurial Rachis.flavorText: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.

Purity.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.
Purity.name: Purity
Purity.flavorText: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2 seconds. You are unlucky.

Shaped Glass.description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).
Shaped Glass.name: Shaped Glass
Shaped Glass.flavorText: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.

Stone Flux Pauldron.description: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).
Stone Flux Pauldron.name: Stone Flux Pauldron
Stone Flux Pauldron.flavorText: Double your health... BUT halve your speed.

Strides of Heresy.description:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.

Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.
Strides of Heresy.name: Strides of Heresy

Transcendence.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.
Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.flavorText: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

Visions of Heresy.description:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.

Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).
Visions of Heresy.name: Visions of Heresy
Visions of Heresy.flavorText: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.

Benthic Bloom.description: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) random items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.
Benthic Bloom.name: Benthic Bloom
Benthic Bloom.flavorText: Upgrades your items at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

Encrusted Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.
Encrusted Key.name: Encrusted Key
Encrusted Key.flavorText: Gain access to an Encrusted Cache that contains a void item. Corrupts all Rusted Keys.

Lost Seer's Lenses.description: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.
Lost Seer's Lenses.name: Lost Seer's Lenses
Lost Seer's Lenses.flavorText: Gain a 0.5% chance to instantly kill a non-boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

Lysate Cell.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Reduces Special skill cooldown by 33%. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.
Lysate Cell.name: Lysate Cell
Lysate Cell.flavorText: Add an extra charge of your Special skill. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

Needletick.description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.
Needletick.name: Needletick
Needletick.flavorText: Chance to collapse enemies on hit. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

Newly Hatched Zoea.description: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all yellow items.
Newly Hatched Zoea.name: Newly Hatched Zoea
Newly Hatched Zoea.flavorText: Periodically recruit allies from the Void. Corrupts all yellow items.

Plasma Shrimp.description: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+40% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.
Plasma Shrimp.name: Plasma Shrimp
Plasma Shrimp.flavorText: While you have shield, fire missiles on every hit. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

Pluripotent Larva.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.
Pluripotent Larva.name: Pluripotent Larva
Pluripotent Larva.flavorText: Get a corrupted extra life. Consumed on use. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

Polylute.description: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.
Polylute.name: Polylute
Polylute.flavorText: Chance to repeatedly strike a single enemy with lightning. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

Safer Spaces.description: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack) Corrupts all Tougher Times.
Safer Spaces.name: Safer Spaces
Safer Spaces.flavorText: Block the next source of damage. Corrupts all Tougher Times.

Singularity Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.
Singularity Band.name: Singularity Band
Singularity Band.flavorText: High damage hits also create unstable black holes. Recharges over time. Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands.

Tentabauble.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack). Corrupts all Chronobaubles.
Tentabauble.name: Tentabauble
Tentabauble.flavorText: Chance to root enemies on hit. Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

Voidsent Flame.description: Upon hitting an enemy at full health, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.
Voidsent Flame.name: Voidsent Flame
Voidsent Flame.flavorText: Full health enemies also detonate on hit. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.

Weeping Fungus.description: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.
Weeping Fungus.name: Weeping Fungus
Weeping Fungus.flavorText: Heal while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.
